      Constructor and Description
      ArrivalManager(java.lang.String busno, java.lang.String stop_code, int bound, int language)
      Creates a new ArrivalManager instance and show logs

      By default, it will load the database from the server by downloading it and save the JSON to memory.
      It can be found at https://db.kmbeta.ml

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.json.JSONObject fetchNewData()
      Send a request to fetch a new bus arrival ETA data
      ArrivalTime getArrivalTime() 
      java.lang.String getArrivalTimeText()
      Returns a formatted arrival time text.

      The arrival time is formatted to: HH:MM
      If hour/minute is less than 10, a 0 will be added to the front.
      If the received response is equal to the last departed message, it will return "End".
      If the received response is invalid, it will return "Invalid".
      If no response received, it will probably return "NoData" or "Failed".
      If the separation of Hour and Minutes failed, it will return the raw arrival time.
      int getBound() 
      static BusDatabase getBusDatabase() 
      java.lang.String getBusNo() 
      static org.json.JSONObject getETAdata(java.lang.String route, java.lang.String busStopCode, int lang, int bound, int stop_seq)
      Get ETA data from KMB server.
      int getLang() 
      java.lang.String getRemainingArrivalMinuteText()
      Get remaining arrival minute formatted

      Returns a string with this format:
      RR min(s)
      which RR is the remaining time.

      Different cases to return another string:
      ---: If srvhr, srvmin, arrhr, arrmin is -1
      Arrived: If remainMin smaller or equal to 0
      int getRemainingArrivalTime()
      Calculates the remaining arrival minutes left.

      Using the time from KMB Datafeed Server
      ServerTime getServerTime() 
      java.lang.String getStopCode() 
      int getStopSeq()

    • Constructor Detail

      • ArrivalManager

        public ArrivalManager(java.lang.String busno,
                      java.lang.String stop_code,
                      int bound,
                      int language)
               throws InvalidArrivalTargetException,
                      CouldNotLoadDatabaseException
        Creates a new ArrivalManager instance and show logs

        By default, it will load the database from the server by downloading it and save the JSON to memory.
        It can be found at https://db.kmbeta.ml
        Parameters:
        busno - Bus No.
        stop_code - Bus Stop Code (e.g. WO04N12500), probably it is specified from a BUS DB source.
        bound - Bus Direction/Bound (1 or 2)
        language - Language to be selected ArrivalManager.ENGLISH_LANG or ArrivalManager.CHINESE_LANG
        Throws:
        InvalidArrivalTargetException - If the specified target arrival was invalid
        CouldNotLoadDatabaseException - If the API could not load the database

      • ArrivalManager

        public ArrivalManager(java.lang.String busno,
                      java.lang.String stop_code,
                      int bound,
                      int language,
                      boolean showLog)
               throws InvalidArrivalTargetException,
                      CouldNotLoadDatabaseException
        Creates a new ArrivalManager instance.

        By default, it will load the database from the server by downloading it and save the JSON to memory.
        It can be found at https://db.kmbeta.ml
        Parameters:
        busno - Bus No.
        stop_code - Bus Stop Code (e.g. WO04N12500), probably it is specified from a BUS DB source.
        bound - Bus Direction/Bound (1 or 2)
        language - Language to be selected ArrivalManager.ENGLISH_LANG or ArrivalManager.CHINESE_LANG
        showLog - Show log
        Throws:
        InvalidArrivalTargetException - If the specified target arrival was invalid
        CouldNotLoadDatabaseException - If the API could not load the database

        Creates a new ArrivalManager instance.

        This will load the database from file.
        Parameters:

        stop_code - Bus Stop Code (e.g. WO04N12500), probably it is specified from a BUS DB source.
        bound - Bus Direction/Bound (1 or 2)

        parent - The class resource parent.
        showLog - Show log
        Throws:
        InvalidArrivalTargetException - If the specified target arrival was invalid
        CouldNotLoadDatabaseException - If the API could not load the database

      • ArrivalManager

        public ArrivalManager(java.lang.String busno,
                      java.lang.String stop_code,
                      int bound,
                      int language,
                      java.lang.Object parent,
                      boolean loadFromClassResources)
               throws InvalidArrivalTargetException,
                      CouldNotLoadDatabaseException
        Creates a new ArrivalManager instance.

        This will load the database from file.
        Parameters:
        busno - Bus No.
        stop_code - Bus Stop Code (e.g. WO04N12500), probably it is specified from a BUS DB source.
        bound - Bus Direction/Bound (1 or 2)
        language - Language to be selected ArrivalManager.ENGLISH_LANG or ArrivalManager.CHINESE_LANG

        CouldNotLoadDatabaseException - If the API could not load the database

      • ArrivalManager

        public ArrivalManager(java.lang.String busno,
                      java.lang.String stop_code,
                      int bound,
                      int language,
                      int loadFromWhere,
                      java.lang.Object classParent,
                      boolean fromClassResources,
                      boolean showLog)
               throws InvalidArrivalTargetException,
                      CouldNotLoadDatabaseException
        Creates a new ArrivalManager instance.

        This function contains all the parameters. Read the documentation/wiki before continue.
        Or simply use another overloaded functions.
        Parameters:
        busno - Bus No.
        stop_code - Bus Stop Code (e.g. WO04N12500), probably it is specified from a BUS DB source.
        bound - Bus Direction/Bound (1 or 2)
        language - Language to be selected ArrivalManager.ENGLISH_LANG or ArrivalManager.CHINESE_LANG
        loadFromWhere - Specify the ArrivalManager.DB_* constant fields, to choose the DB source.
        classParent - If ArrivalManager.DB_LOAD_FROM_FILE is specified, and load from class resources, you can specify a class parent.
        fromClassResources - Only if ArrivalManager.DB_LOAD_FROM_FILE is specified, specify whether the file should be loaded from class resources
        Throws:
        InvalidArrivalTargetException - If the specified target arrival was invalid
        CouldNotLoadDatabaseException - If the API could not load the database

      • getRemainingArrivalMinuteText

        public java.lang.String getRemainingArrivalMinuteText()
        Get remaining arrival minute formatted

        Returns a string with this format:
        RR min(s)
        which RR is the remaining time.

        Different cases to return another string:
        ---: If srvhr, srvmin, arrhr, arrmin is -1
        Arrived: If remainMin smaller or equal to 0
        Returns:
        A String with the format mentioned above

      • getRemainingArrivalTime

        public int getRemainingArrivalTime()
        Calculates the remaining arrival minutes left.

        Using the time from KMB Datafeed Server
        Returns:
        Remaining minutes

      • getArrivalTimeText

        public java.lang.String getArrivalTimeText()
                                    throws NoETADataFetchedError,
                                           NoServerTimeFetchedError
        Returns a formatted arrival time text.

        The arrival time is formatted to: HH:MM
        If hour/minute is less than 10, a 0 will be added to the front.
        If the received response is equal to the last departed message, it will return "End".
        If the received response is invalid, it will return "Invalid".
        If no response received, it will probably return "NoData" or "Failed".
        If the separation of Hour and Minutes failed, it will return the raw arrival time.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        NoETADataFetchedError
        NoServerTimeFetchedError

      • getETAdata

        public static org.json.JSONObject getETAdata(java.lang.String route,
                                             java.lang.String busStopCode,
                                             int lang,
                                             int bound,
                                             int stop_seq)
        Get ETA data from KMB server. And save to memory for other functions.

        Must be called before any ETA reading events
        Parameters:
        route - The bus number / route name / bus name
        busStopCode - The bus-stop code
        lang - Language to be received. KmbApi.ENGLISH_LANG / KmbApi.CHINESE_LANG
        bound - Bus-Line Bound
        stop_seq - Bus-stop sequence
        Returns:
        JSONObject
